parameters.name: func
parameters.description: a function to apply to each member

returnParameters.description: new stream containing result of applying parameter `func` to each member of parameter `stm` in order

functions.name: 'map

returnParameters.description: () if the close completed successfully, otherwise an error

functions.name: close
functions.description:
Closes a stream.

This releases any system resources being used by the stream.
Closing a stream that has already been closed has no effect and returns `()`.

```ballerina
stream<int, error?> strm = new;
check strm.close();
```

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: a predicate to apply to each member to test whether it should be selected

returnParameters.description: new stream only containing members of parameter `stm` for which parameter `func` evaluates to true

functions.name: filter

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: a function to apply to each member

returnParameters.description: () if the close completed successfully, otherwise an error

functions.name: forEach

returnParameters.description: a new iterator object that will iterate over the members of parameter `stm`.

functions.name: iterator

returnParameters.description:
If the stream has elements, return the element wrapped in a record with single field called `value`,
otherwise returns ()

functions.name: next

parameters.name: initial
parameters.description: initial value for the first argument of combining parameter `func`

returnParameters.description: result of combining the members of parameter `stm` using parameter `func`

functions.name: reduce
functions.description:
Combines the members of a stream using a combining function.

The combining function takes the combined value so far and a member of the stream,
and returns a new combined value.

```ballerina
stream<int> scores = [45, 60, 75, 30, 90].toStream();
scores.reduce(isolated function (int total, int score) returns int => total + score, 0) â‡’ 300
```

errors.name: ErrorType
errors.description:
A type parameter that is a subtype of `error`.
Has the special semantic that when used in a declaration
all uses in the declaration must refer to same type.

types.name: Type
types.description:
A type parameter that is a subtype of `any|error`.
Has the special semantic that when used in a declaration
all uses in the declaration must refer to same type.

A type parameter that is a subtype of `any|error`.
Has the special semantic that when used in a declaration
all uses in the declaration must refer to same type.

modules.summary: The `lang.stream` module corresponds to the `stream` basic type.
modules.description:
## Module overview

The `lang.stream` module corresponds to the `stream` basic type.

Closing a stream that has already been closed has no effect and returns `()`.

